articles.description: Liverpool's spending spree has put head coach Arne Slot under increased pressure to repeat title success, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Liverpool's Premier League spending spree has increased pressure on Arne Slot

articles.description: Wayne Rooney was involved in transfer sagas in his playing career and says in his new podcast it will be hard for Alexander Isak to stay at Newcastle.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Wayne Rooney says it is difficult for striker to stay at Newcastle

articles.description: We ask 32 BBC Sport football pundits to predict who will win the Premier League title, and which clubs will finish in the top four this season.
articles.title: Premier League predictions 2025-26: BBC Sport pundits pick their top four

articles.description: The Red Roses' collaboration with Barbie will initially include t-shirts, hoodies and replica balls, rather than the signature dolls.
articles.title: Women's Rugby World Cup: England partner with Barbie - but without dolls

articles.description: Newcastle are close to signing Aston Villa midfielder Jacob Ramsey in deal worth about £40m.
articles.title: Jacob Ramsey: Newcastle agree £40m deal to sign Aston Villa midfielder

articles.description: Brentford agree a club record deal worth up to £42.5m for Bournemouth forward Dango Ouattara.
articles.title: Dango Ouattara: Brentford agree deal worth £42.5m for Bournemouth forward

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan fights back from 5-3 down to beat Kyren Wilson 6-5 and reach the last four at the Saudi Arabia Masters.
articles.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan fights back to reach Saudi Arabia semis with win over Kyren Wilson

articles.description: Our Fantasy Premier League experts pick eight players they think will help you have a successful FPL season.
articles.title: FPL 2025-26: Eight players who could help you win this year, including Wirtz, Fernandes and Murillo

articles.description: Kieron Bowie scores "a special goal at a special time" as Hibernian come through a "massive test of character" to beat Partizan Belgrade in Conference League qualifying.
articles.title: Kieron Bowie: Hibernian striker delivers moment of magic

articles.description: World number two Coco Gauff beats Lucia Bronzetti 6-2 6-4 to book her place in the quarter-finals of the Cincinnati Open.
articles.title: Coco Gauff beats Lucia Bronzetti to reach Cincinnati Open last eight
